page.title: 04ATTITUDES IN NORTH BRENT
page.content: Generally speaking people think this is a good area to live in with friendly neighbours and nice gardens. Some of the things people dislike about this area are the rates,litter and violence.Most people though,feel safe here but a few are concerned about the rising crime rate. An overwhelming majority feel are sufficient.However bus services are in frequent but trains are good. In general people think there are enough open spaces but some express concern that there aren't enough safe childrens playgrounds.The general feeling is that streets are reasonabally clean except when there is snow and in shoppin areas too.
